Articles.Content: Hello KSP community, sorry for recent Inactivity, My internet is down for another week or two, The Voyager Labs thread will be up ASAP and I'll try to contact everyone who messaged me while I'm in school today, Well Without internet I have actually been playing KSP and been off the forums I've designed a few new rockets and rebuild the Plooto rockets, Hopefully soon I will have internet again and although it may not concern many of you I thought I would update everyone who's wondering.
